message.content: {"given_definition_quality":75,"better_definition":"hour (a unit of time equal to 60 minutes)","sentence":"我有一个小时。","image_prompt":"A small, animated clock with clear numbers and moving hands, showing one full hour. The setting has soft apocalyptic lighting with gentle rays filtering through broken windows in a calm room. The environment should feel quiet and slightly surreal, in a painterly animation style. The clock sits on a table with subtle shadows and minimal background distractions.","sentence_translation":"I have one hour."}
